title: I honestly have more fun trolling than I do playing the game.
body:
Says a lot about the overall quality of the game, huh.

Not that I can troll anymore because the millennials get offended over the slightest thing and, boom, you're reported.

replies.body: I would think this says much about you, and has nothing to do with the quality of the game. Just my opinion.

> [{quoted}](name=Dungeon Warlord,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YEbOTUAP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-07T00:52:22.699+0000)
>
> I would think this says much about you, and has nothing to do with the quality of the game. Just my opinion.

Yeah, well, no one asked for your opinion.
Well, posting on boards sorta implies you are asking for opinions. If you want to talk to a wall that can't talk back, this isn't the place.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YEbOTUAP,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-07T09:19:24.777+0000)
>
> Well, posting on boards sorta implies you are asking for opinions. If you want to talk to a wall that can't talk back, this isn't the place.

Considering the average IQ of the OCE player base is the equivalent of a brick wall that seems ironic.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YEbOTUAP,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-08T02:37:44.300+0000)
>
> https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Negativity_bias

I'm not sure what you're trying to say.

Negative experiences stand out more, so even if you saw equal numbers of "low" and "high" IQ players you would still feel there were more lows.

My point was your statement was incredibly biased, and a massive disservice to the playerbase. Just because there are some real dumb people out there, and that those people are often very loud, doesn't mean everyone is a dumb, loud person. After all, are you not part of the OCE player base? You seem very sure that your IQ is not equivalent to a brick wall.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YEbOTUAP,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-08T03:13:42.359+0000)
>
> Negative experiences stand out more, so even if you saw equal numbers of "low" and "high" IQ players you would still feel there were more lows.
> 
> My point was your statement was incredibly biased, and a massive disservice to the playerbase. Just because there are some real dumb people out there, and that those people are often very loud, doesn't mean everyone is a dumb, loud person. After all, are you not part of the OCE player base? You seem very sure that your IQ is not equivalent to a brick wall.

Lmao, alright. I haven't once seen anyone be positive or optimistic on this server. No one is like, "Hey, guys, let's have a fun game!" Of course, just because I don't see it, doesn't mean it doesn't happen, but it's a joke how negative this server is, not to mention stupid.

No, I am not a part of this... community, if it could be called that. I have separated myself from such dim-witted and vacuous players. If I could, and one day I shall, I will gladly depart from this pathetic, backwards, repugnant country known as Australia.

Also, my IQ is very high, thank you very much. Don't insult me by comparing me to the masses of unintelligent apes that are active on this server.

And yet, you make yourself part of the problem you so despise. I don't see you making an effort to be positive or optimistic, you aren't even being neutral. Narcissism to such a degree is not exactly considered a positive trait, and judging the quality of a person based on their intelligence is...short sighted at best.

An intelligent person can be an asshole, just as someone of lesser intelligence could be the nicest person you've ever met. There's more to a person than just how smart you perceive them to be.

The vast majority of players I encounter are hardly dim-witted or vacuous. Quite the opposite in fact.For every game I have with some toxic asshat there are 5 more with either nice or neutral players. I'd say that's not very indicative of the community being, as you say, dim-witted and vacuous.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YEbOTUAP,comment-id=000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-08T08:01:20.541+0000)
>
> And yet, you make yourself part of the problem you so despise. I don't see you making an effort to be positive or optimistic, you aren't even being neutral. Narcissism to such a degree is not exactly considered a positive trait, and judging the quality of a person based on their intelligence is...short sighted at best.
> 
> An intelligent person can be an asshole, just as someone of lesser intelligence could be the nicest person you've ever met. There's more to a person than just how smart you perceive them to be.
> 
> The vast majority of players I encounter are hardly dim-witted or vacuous. Quite the opposite in fact.For every game I have with some toxic asshat there are 5 more with either nice or neutral players. I'd say that's not very indicative of the community being, as you say, dim-witted and vacuous.

People don't deserve my positivity. I am not wasting my breath on people who will most likely feed. Don't make me get out my int list which has 40+ names on it. These people, the pathetic lot they are, do not deserve my kindness. I am taking all the kills. I am taking all the creeps. If I am forced to support, I support myself and only myself.

Intelligence is the only thing that should be judged. Why bother trying anything if you're stupid? A less intelligent person is not going to climb as they lack the brainpower. They cannot comprehend the strategy to make plays or climb. That's why most people with single digit IQ's play champs like Zed, Riven, and Yasuo.

This is facts, alright. I'm not talking out of my butt, and even if I was, I'm sure it would sound more intelligent than half of the things these kids could produce from their mouths.

I could easily be rank one. OCE challenger is like NA plat. Again, real facts.

> [{quoted}](name=Broken Scripts,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YEbOTUAP,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-08T10:32:25.145+0000)
>
> People don't deserve my positivity. I am not wasting my breath on people who will most likely feed. Don't make me get out my int list which has 40+ names on it. These people, the pathetic lot they are, do not deserve my kindness. I am taking all the kills. I am taking all the creeps. If I am forced to support, I support myself and only myself.
> 
> Intelligence is the only thing that should be judged. Why bother trying anything if you're stupid? A less intelligent person is not going to climb as they lack the brainpower. They cannot comprehend the strategy to make plays or climb. That's why most people with single digit IQ's play champs like Zed, Riven, and Yasuo.
> 
> This is facts, alright. I'm not talking out of my butt, and even if I was, I'm sure it would sound more intelligent than half of the things these kids could produce from their mouths.
> 
> I could easily be rank one. OCE challenger is like NA plat. Again, real facts.

You don't play games with your brain only, at least this game is not within that genre, you also need your fingers and reflexes, which come from first being physically capable to play the game in the first place and the next thing besides a brain is the amount of time needed to do the practicing to form the correct reflex. In other words, a highschool dropout player who'd played full-time since beta on League will almost always do and know better than a PhD who only plays occasionally on weekends. Brain is not the only thing in charge here, it doesn't work like that.

And even if it is, so what? "These people, the pathetic lot they are, do not deserve my kindness"? What are you on about? Do you go around town berating and kicking down little kids, old people, disabled individuals, mentally handicapped, the lesser cultured/educated, or anyone who's merely perceived by you as being inferior in some manner? Who are you to be this cynical and condescending, and act like the little ego trip is all justified?

Not to mention, "I could easily be rank one. OCE challenger is like NA plat. Again, real facts.", except you're so far from it there is no "easily" here. Hence even in your own narrative, you by your own definitions, as skewed as they are, are identified as among the bottom of all of us hopeless plebeians who deserve no "kindness" or whatever it is you're preaching.

So.............?

It's 1 thing to hate champions and certain individuals, I mean sure, but hating everyone and intentionally ruin everyone's day while fondling your own asshole is just plain dumb, really. Hell, if you hate people so much, why play a team game, it's not like there are no singleplayer games out there you know?
This is why we can't have nice things.....

Just do well on a troll pick its literally the funniest thing ever. Like yesterday i played ap zz/rot nasus top,had under 100 stacks by 25 minutes  and laughed my ass off when my beating my lane oppenent caused a 15 minute arguement in the end game by the enemy team focused on the fact i had so little stacks, no tankiness and still beat the enemy jayce.

> [{quoted}](name=Colonel J,realm=NA,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YEbOTUAP,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-03-07T07:42:52.023+0000)
>
> trolling is bad!

Not sure if you're the real Colonel J or not, but I remember you from my days trolling on NA GD before I kept getting banned.

> [{quoted}](name=Broken Scripts,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YEbOTUAP,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-03-07T22:46:47.105+0000)
>
> Not sure if you're the real Colonel J or not, but I remember you from my days trolling on NA GD before I kept getting banned.

What name did you go by?
i think people report trolls, not because they are 'offended' but because you purposely lost them the game. but sure i'd agree people report for verbal abuse way too willingly, and need to man up.

> [{quoted}](name=hentai cutie pie,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YEbOTUAP,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-03-08T08:01:47.057+0000)
>
> i think people report trolls, not because they are 'offended' but because you purposely lost them the game. but sure i'd agree people report for verbal abuse way too willingly, and need to man up.

The instant you say something you'll be reported.

> [{quoted}](name=Broken Scripts,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YEbOTUAP,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-03-08T10:32:55.636+0000)
>
> The instant you say something you'll be reported.

Being reported doesn't mean you will be punished also.

You have to be found crossing the line somehow to be banned after the report is handed in.

And Riot does have a rather general standard when it comes to who to ban or otherwise. 

Don't tell someone to kill themselves, don't insult themselves and attack their personal attributes and associations, don't harass others and cry over every little thing/mistakes and excessively so, don't troll and ruin other people's games for your morbid sense of fun at the expense of 9 others who're caught within the BS for doing nothing wrong, etc, very basic stuff.
